Name: Hollow Witch
About the game: The witch woke up! She feels hollow and must gather magic, evolve and overcome the trials. Honor the memories of her equals fighting and absorbing mystic souls reaching an unmatched power! Consume or be consumed, what will be the fate! Play as the witch, going up in a dungeon trying to reach the exit while performs the last wishes of the dead witches and absorb their power reaching levels never seen before in this amazing pixel art 2D action platformer game.
